buildCommand: npm run check-env && npm run build

headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://clerk.spearity.com https://clerk.com https://*.clerk.accounts.dev https://challenges.cloudflare.com https://vercel.live; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; connect-src 'self' https://api.clerk.com https://clerk.spearity.com https://*.clerk.accounts.dev https://fedrcezunboposdjsoqp.supabase.co wss://fedrcezunboposdjsoqp.supabase.co https://api.zoom.us https://zoom.us https://accounts.google.com https://www.googleapis.com https://oauth2.googleapis.com https://vercel.live wss://ws-us3.pusher.com; frame-src 'self' https://challenges.cloudflare.com https://clerk.spearity.com https://*.clerk.accounts.dev https://js.stripe.com; worker-src 'self' blob:; child-src 'self' blob:; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self' https://clerk.spearity.com https://*.clerk.accounts.dev; frame-ancestors 'none';
